name: Save Battery
description:
This Game was made exclusively for Uniday Studio's game jam.

In this one you will have only one challenge: Survive!

To survive you'll have to pick up occasional batteries to fill your energy, if it runs out it's game over!

But is it that simple? 

No! I, the developer, wanted more challenge! In a short time the player is reborn and a ghost is born in the place and repeats the player's previous moves.

Okay fine, but what do these ghosts do?

 Simple, when the ghosts are born they can be charged or without battery, and if they are out of battery and the player touches them, these naughty red ones will steal part of your battery.

What should I do then?

 You must collect the batteries in the scenario while you are on top of a cart that runs through a cave, but be careful, calculate your movements well, because remember that a ghost will appear in the place when reborn, and after many rounds the scenario will go be full of the naughty ones that will occasionally steal your energy to death.

Extra information:
  • The game has 4 language options for different players: English, Portuguese, Spanish and Russian!
  • The game has a pause menu and options menu for adjusting volumes and screen resolutions!
  • 100% game made by one person
Now a challenge!

I hope you like the game and don't forget to share how far you've reached! I developer checked up to level 17.

Will you players be able to beat me????

PSV Games Studio - 2021
